title: Edit Apply Certificate
subtitle: Re-apply Let's Encrypt Certificate
folderNameHelp: Unique identifier, can only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens
sansPlaceholder:
One domain per line, e.g.:
www.example.com
api.example.com
sansHelp: Enter one domain per line, leave empty to apply for main domain only
webrootHelp: Web root directory path for HTTP-01 verification, leave empty to use default path
